name: モメンドー
description: The elusive and mysterious Pokemon, Momendoo, is rarely seen in its cosmic purple armor. Living in castle-like environments, it is believed that Momendoo has the unusual ability to manipulate and deceive its opponents with its unique tricks. A master of misdirection, Momendoo can often be found gliding around its home with its powerful wings, ready to surprise anyone who is foolish enough to try and catch it unawares.
image_prompt: モメンドー::0 a rare dark-type pokemon::1.8, wearing purple cosmic armor, in a castle environment, violent shadows, anime sketch --niji --ar 3:2
